name: Rachel West
text: Working with The Rainbow Balloon Company was awesome! We were needing some centerpieces for our Dunkin' Grand Opening at 2419 Acton Road, Vestavia Hills, AL, and what we got was above and beyond what we were expecting. This is our second time using them for a Grand Opening and a second time we were incredibly happy! The team was easy to work with and they went above and beyond to help us!

name: Jonathan Fudge
text:
The Rainbow Balloon Company is our go-to balloon decor company in Birmingham, Alabama and we absolutely LOVE their work. Whether we are trying to book a client for organic garland or for the every growing in popularity yard decor, they are amazing to work with. I highly recommend them.

They even offer YARD CARDS! We are so excited to have found them and been able to work with them. Our staff ran into them at a convention where the owner of The Rainbow Balloon Company was winning first place after first place awards for her balloons. Well deserved! If you found this company, consider yourself lucky and give them a call. You won't find anyone better in the greater Birmingham area.

name: Cliff Jones
text: I was referred to The Rainbow Balloon Company by a friend and used them for my wife's 40th Birthday. Not only did they do a PHENOMENAL JOB, but their customer service was top notch and everything was handled in a very professional manner!  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them for any occasion!  You wont be disappointed!

name: Jessica Lee Ramos
text: Jessica and Mary did an amazing job setting up a birthday display for my twin boys turning 10.  They will work with you to get everything just right with balloon colors to coordinate with the yard signs.  Super friendly!  I will definitely refer them to my friends and plan to use them again. Thank you Rainbow Balloon Company!

name: Arturo Briseno Jr
text: With everyone being stuck at home for COVID (so no classroom birthday parties), we wanted to do something special for our little one's birthday this year.  We ordered a Classic Celebration Marquis from The Rainbow Balloon Company and loved it.  They offer different services but for us the marquis was perfect...  something a little different (and in her favorite colors) to brighten up her day.  Highly recommend checking them out!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! We hope your daughter had a great birthday!!!

name: Julie Bean
text: Fantastic experience working with these fun, talented women! They make the whole process...from planning to delivery/setup....efficient and easy. Their work is beautiful. Highly recommend!

name: Sandra Remington
text: So easy to work with and very responsive! Yard signs and balloons looked wonderful and added such a special cheer to our birthday boy’s day. We will definitely be using them again!

name: Kristin Bundren
text: We love Rainbow Balloon Company! We have ordered from them twice this year (a birthday and New Years) and the balloons were fabulous! The balloon art adds a fun, colorful, and festive touch. Great communication and product! We are looking forward to more in the future!!

name: Olivia Horan
text: If you come to any Diamonds Direct event and see our gorgeous balloon garlands -- these ladies need to get all the credit! Fabulous job every time, and they have a knack for bringing your visions to life :) Highly recommend for any event, big or small!

resp.text: Always a pleasure working with you!!! :D

name: Ashlee Ammons
text:
I found this awesome company after a Google search, I wanted to surprise my Mom with something positive on my Grandmothers 1st birthday following her passing this year.  Although they are known for celebratory occasions they really worked with me to create something with the appropriate tone to make my Mom feel special on an otherwise somber day.  My Mom was deeply touch by this and cried and smiled all weekend long.  The ladies at RBC were wonderful to work with, I accidentally gave them the incorrect address to the house and they communicated with me quickly and got it set and delivered the WOW
as promised!  I would highly recco them, if I need anything further, they will be my 1st call!  Last, they just kinda seem like awesome humans, they were kind, friendly and personable throughout!

name: ShuMarri Jennings
text: They were very professional. They all had great attitudes and the great work ethic. They made sure our event was everything we imagined.

name: Magic City Cheer & Tumble
text: Great company! Easy to work with- gave us exactly what we asked for. Great product.

name: Amanda Austin
text: Very responsive, easy to work with, and did a wonderful job decorating our yard for our daughter's birthday!

name: Deidra K. Diaz
text: I am so thankful I got a Facebook recommendation to use the Rainbow Balloon Company!   Your creativity and decor is SO MUCH better than just having big letters on the lawn.  The custom colors, bright and vivid design and personal touch was exactly what we wanted to celebrate my Mom's 71st Birthday during the Covid-19 pandemic.  I can't say THANK YOU enough, with a special nod to Chandler who was exceptional customer servixe!   Wow...your company is amazing!

name: Ann Katherine Hardeman
text: Excellent service! Amazing balloons!  A pleasure to work with, and so helpful!

name: Steven Hughes
text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

name: Rachel West
text: Working with The Rainbow Balloon Company was awesome! We were needing some centerpieces for our Dunkin' Grand Opening at 2419 Acton Road, Vestavia Hills, AL, and what we got was above and beyond what we were expecting. This is our second time using them for a Grand Opening and a second time we were incredibly happy! The team was easy to work with and they went above and beyond to help us!

name: Ann Katherine Hardeman
text: Excellent service! Amazing balloons!  A pleasure to work with, and so helpful!

name: Steven Hughes
text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Kate Arves
text: A shop I will return to many times in the future. I ordered a planner from Jennifer’s shop and she included a really kind note and some extra goodies! It shipped very quickly and was packaged really well!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kate! Appreciate the nice review. And new planners are coming soon!!

name: danielle bentley
text: The BEST place to shop in Troy, AL. And my absolute FAVORITE online store!! Check them out, you won’t be disappointed.

resp.text: Thanks Dani!

name: Tamara Furlow
text: My favorite stationary shop!

resp.text: Thanks so much Tamara!

name: Brenda Palmer
text: Very friendly staff that meets all of your needs with a smile!!!!!   Very professional & down to earth...has good selection of items.

name: Jennifer Housley
text: These girls stay open until the last minute thank goodness, I need last minute pirate get up for my 4 year old, they hooked me up and I'm so grateful. I mean I showered up with 5 minutes to spare on closing time. They are sweet, helpful and I'll never drive all the way to Huntsville to go to the party store, ours here in town has everything!

name: Trace Ces
text:
Staff was friendly professionals helpful but not pushy. Very well stocked and neat store.
Thank You!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Glad you came in! Come see us again soon!

name: Variety with GC Warden
text: Great selection!!! Easy purchase and lady that helped me was super awesome:)

name: amber story
text: This was the 2nd year we came for there event.  Ita always fun great deals and such nice people. We will always come back!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your support! We are so glad yall came!!! :)

name: AZ Detailing
text: Courtney and her staff are fantastic people, I brought in some shirts to get printed for my company and she went above and beyond to get them done right! Courtney will always have my guaranteed business for any party, event, or vinyl work I need done! Go and see them, she guaranteed has the best prices around and you get the best service! Thanks Party Central, we’ll be in touch!

name: James Truffa
text: Good place to get stuff for a party

name: Mrs. DeAviance Fowlks-Turner
text: Rented tables,  chairs,   balloons, and other party needs. Not bad; just wish they were located in Athens, AL.

name: Diana Kritinar
text: They have a ton of fun party stuff and a great selection of balloons! Also great for cake supplies!

resp.text: Thank you Diana!!!!

name: Jeffery Robison
text: Great place for all kinds of party needs, they make it easy for those special party items.

resp.text: Thank you Jeffery! Look forward to seeing you in the store!

name: Kenyon Smith
text: They are fabulous!!!! Had so MUCH TO CHOOSE FROM!!!!  Excellent service 💗💗💗

resp.text: Thank you so much! Thank you for shopping local with Party Central :)

name: Miranda Towe
text: Very disappointed in the selection for birthday parties. They had more graduation and older kids and adult stuff than kids.

resp.text: I am very sorry we didn’t have what you wanted. We strive to keep what customers are asking for. Let us know what you were looking for so we can bring in to the store for the Decatur area.

name: Kristen Chandler
text: I used to love this store, but not after my last purchase.  Make sure to check every single item before you leave cause they give you a hard time on exchanges WITH receipts & you only get 2 exchanges.  I will not spend a single dime here again!!  Unfortunately I've already given them hundreds of dollars over the years before finding out how ridiculous they could be.. Sincerely, a very disappointed ex-customer!!  I'll be taking my money to Huntsville's party stores from now on!!

resp.text: I appreciate every customer but we don't allow returns on costumes in October for obvious reasons.  I made an exception for this customer and actually replaced masks twice that her children played in. After two exchanges I wrote no more exchanges on this ticket. Anyone that would like to know more can call me. Nancy 256-353-5555

name: Instigatee
text: Worst store ever. The owner is down right rude. I have never been so mad when I have left a store. My children were holding small toys and playing with each other. She quickly said alright kids put the toys down. Which my children didnt hesitate to do so. However, it made me mad because she never even ask if I was going to purchase these items. So I put the items that I was going to purchase up and told her I would never buy anything from her store again. She said oh well its my store. And I should teach my kids manners. My children are very well mannered. She is an old miserable lady that has nothing better to do than to try and make other peoples lives miserable. She was disrespectful and very thoughtless when dealing with a customer.

name: Kim Rutherford
text: This place has all your party supplies. Good selection.

resp.text: Thank you Kim!

name: Glenn Byrum
text: If you want to party this is the place to get ready.

resp.text: Thank you Glenn!

name: Camo Hut
text: Great service, had everything I needed and very low prices. great selection of .99¢ items

name: Sherry Kellum
text: Great service! Lots of cute items and many Halloween costumes!

name: Matthew Lalley
text: They had the perfect Invitation for my party. Thanks Guys

name: WannaWaveTV
text: I loved this place! Found everything I needed!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Kimberly Gordon
text: Great Staff....very friendly and helpful

name: Melanie King
text: Loved it

resp.text: Hi Melanie, please let us know what we need to do to make your shopping experience with Party Central better!

name: raven Thrasher
text: Very friendly

resp.text: Thank you Raven!

name: Patty. Phillips
text: no selection

resp.text: We strive to have what our customers are looking for! Let us know what were missing so we can look at adding it in our store! Thank you!

name: Larry “Reaper” Smith
text: Great prices

name: Tracey Doodlebug
text: Not much selection

name: Bonnie Roper
text: Very helpful and friendly

resp.text: Thank you Bonnie! Come back and see us anytime :)  ___Courtney - Owner

name: Lisa Lynn Terry
text: Never been

resp.text: If i am reading this correctly you have never been. Please come to our new location on the beltline behind Starbucks  opening July 1st

name: Jay Zdonek
text: Small but had what I needed.

resp.text:
Hey Michael, glad we had what you needed! Come back soon, thanks for the review.
--Courtney, owner

name: Jennifer Perry
text: Perfect for parties

name: Staroffire Day
text:
(Translated by Google) Bio orb i.v un

(Original)
Bio orb i.v un

resp.text: I’m not sure what that means?

name: Little Big Company
text: LBC provided affordable services to the surrounding areas with optional services for decor. Conveniently located in central Montgomery near fire and police stations with ample parking. This is a great option for intimate events like baby showers, kids parties , bridal luncheons and etc.

name: LaDora Hayes
text: The Little Big Company was so helpful, affordable, and convenient. I rented the sweetheart chairs for my sister and brother in law's wedding. The chairs were so beautiful. This company responded immediately to my needs. They were so nice in answering any questions that I had. I will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing LBC. We hope to continue to provide quality service to you and many others in the future.

name: Lakeya Richardson
text: Little Big Company made my son 13th birthday party memorable from the personalize treats to the customized backdrop. Everything I envisioned it to be. Professional and delivered on time. Highly recommend you to have your next event created by her. Thanks again!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing LBC ! We hope to continue to provide you quality service in the future.

name: Charlotte Riddick
text: Great experience with this company. Fast and friendly service, fast delivery. Would definitely recommend and will definitely be ordering again!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing LBC! We look forward to serving you again!

name: Sequoyah Maxwell
text: Little Big Company was awesome! The owner has great customer service, makes good on her promises and great products. Thank you Jessica for making my two weekend events memorable.

resp.text: Thank you for renting with us. We look forward to assisting you in the future!

name: Maaly Sharif
text: Very nice and pretty decoration... Very nice work we just having our wedding party yesterday and all the people like it... Thank you Little Big Company.

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate you working with us for your special event!

name: Dreams Cometrue
text: Fast and friendly i love her service*HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

resp.text: Thank you for the rating!

name: Varetta Powell
text: My daughter had her 13th birthday Glow party at Little Big Company and it was the greatest. She and her friends had tons of fun and Jessica was a pleasure to work with. She definitely made party planning an easy and manageable experience and exceeded my expectations. I plan to use Little Big Company for future events.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us! We look forward to working together with you again!

name: D Flowers
text: Little Big Company is great for any event/party needs. The owner is very helpful when planning events and ensures that everything is done in an orderly and timely fashion. I strongly recommend The Little Big Company, for your event/party needs.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing LBC, we appreciate your business.

name: Nathaniel Hebert
text: LBC does a great  job with everything I need done. From custom flyers, invitations to party decor.

name: GLORIA BASSETT
text: Little Big Company has a large selection of various themes for birthday parties, weddings, baby showers and etc. They listen to your want list and take it from there. Every little thing comes together beautiful! Prices very reasonable!

name: Beautifulflower52
text: Nice environment to hold a small gathering. Soundproof, therefore, the music doesn't disturb the other businesses.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing LBC, we appreciate your business.

name: Wendy Harris
text: Very professional, reasonable rental prices and clean facility. She will make your dream a reality. Trust the experience!!

name: Tilisha Beaton
text: I used LBC for my baby shower and The owner was very professional and provided beautiful decor for my celebration, it was a great experience. We will be using this company again for more parties

name: Teresa Long
text: LBC is a great venue for your event needs. They are very professional and dedicated to assisting you in making your event a success.

name: Stephenie Bassett
text: Great space! Great decorating, great concept of your ideas coming to fruition!

name: Paula Harris
text: Great place to have a party for any age. I was beyond happy to do business with the Little Big Company.

resp.text: Thank you! We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Jessica Barnes
text: Great spot for intimate events and great rental options at affordable prices!

name: Leundra Robinson
text: Such a wonderful company, and Jessica is a very professional person to work with.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing LBC, we appreciate your business.

name: Shunkesha Sankey
text: Great location and a go to for all your needs for your next event

name: CECIL HICKS
text: Great place to host your event!

resp.text: Thank you! We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Shundra Bristow
text: Great service  great event planner !!!!

resp.text: Thank you! We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Tanisha Bell
text: Very professional and customer friendly

name: Crystal Banks
text: nice place to rent

resp.text: Thank you for choosing LBC, we appreciate your business.
